Inc.","details":"Controls funding mode and open-ended status for investment vehicles.      This facet enables funds to operate in different modes:      COMMITMENT Mode (Traditional PE/VC):      - Investors subscribe with capital commitments      - GP issues capital calls to draw down commitments      - Tokens minted only when capital is funded      DIRECT Mode (DeFi/Hedge Fund):      - Investors invest immediately at current NAV      - Tokens minted instantly upon investment      - No capital call mechanism      HYBRID Mode:      - Both modes available simultaneously      - Institutional LPs can use commitment structure      - Retail investors can invest directly      Mode Switching Safety:      - Cannot switch to DIRECT if unfunded commitments exist      - This protects LP rights and capital call obligations","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was called"}}],"VehicleConfig_InvalidFundingMode(uint8,uint8)":[{"params":{"actual":"The actual funding mode","required":"The required funding mode"}}],"VehicleConfig_PendingRedemptionsExist(uint256)":[{"params":{"pendingCount":"Number of pending redemption requests"}}],"VehicleConfig_UnfundedCommitmentsExist(uint256)":[{"params":{"unfundedAmount":"Total unfunded commitment amount"}}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"VehicleConfig_init(uint8,bool)":{"params":{"fundingMode":"Initial funding mode","isOpenEnded":"Whether the fund is open-ended (allows allowed"}},"isDirectInvestmentAllowed()":{"details":"Returns true if mode is DIRECT or HYBRID","returns":{"_0":"True if direct investment allowed"}},"isOpenEnded()":{"returns":{"_0":"True if params.isOpenEnded: Whether the fund is open-ended (allows redemptions)

isCommitmentAllowed().details: Returns true if mode is COMMITMENT or HYBRID

isDirectInvestmentAllowed().details: Returns true if mode is DIRECT or HYBRID

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

setFundingMode(uint8).details: Cannot switch to DIRECT if unfunded commitments exist

setOpenEnded(bool).details: Cannot switch to closed-end if pending redemptions exist

params.isOpenEnded: Whether the fund should be open-ended

isCommitmentAllowed().notice: Check if commitment-based investment is allowed

isDirectInvestmentAllowed().notice: Check if direct investment is allowed

isVehicleConfigInitialized().notice: Check if vehicle config is initialized

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

requireDirectInvestmentAllowed().notice: Require that direct investment is allowed
